barista_record.MSG_TEXT: Warning - %1 is not an official AddonSoftware release version![$0a$]This version cannot be upgraded using the Upgrade Wizard, and should NOT be used in a production environment.[$0a$]
This repository is not a clone or fork of the Official AddonSoftware Repository. Only the official AddonSoftware Repository or its descendants may be used for installations and upgrades. [$0a$]
Bank Routing Number must be a 9-digit number.[$0a$]
Bank routing number required for Checking and Savings accounts.[$0a$]
Not a valid Bank Routing Number.[$0a$]
The Barista installation directory must be under the installation base directory, %1[$0a$]
Not a directory: %1[$0a$]
Bad email address format: %1[$0a$] %2[$0a$]
Period must be between 1 and %1 for fiscal year %2.[$0a$]
Encountered a problem creating the folder: %1[$0a$]Error message is: (%2)[$0a$]Error number is: %3[$0a$]
Encountered a problem with the Google Docs service uploading: %1[$0a$]Error message is: (%2)[$0a$]
The following bad codes have been removed from the list: %1[$0a$]
New sync directory cannot be the same as old sync directory.[$0a$]

This appears to be a non-version neutral installation where the Barista directory should be directly[$0a$]under the Installation Base Directory. This needs to be corrected before continuing. Continue?[$0a$]
Old sync directory cannot be the same as new sync directory.[$0a$]
Sync directory name must end with "/data/sync".[$0a$]

This appears to be a version neutral installation where the Barista directory should NOT be directly[$0a$]under the Installation Base Directory. This needs to be corrected before continuing. Continue?[$0a$]
The Work Order Type must have a WO Category of %1.[$0a$]
A Barista installation already exists at this location: %1[$0a$]

Cannot delete this Bank Account Code. It is currently used in Bank Reconciliation for account %1.[$0a$]
The MICR account format string must contain a number symbol (#) for each character in your bank account, [$0a$]along with any other valid MICR characters specified by your bank.[$0a$]
Bank Account Number must be a number with at least 4 digits.[$0a$]
Bank account number required for Checking and Savings accounts.[$0a$]
Cannot backup %1 at this time. It is currently in use by another process.[$0a$]
Batched files for this process are not currently empty,[$0a$]so cannot turn on batching at this time.[$0a$]

No Email Account has been selected. Click OK to save as is, or Cancel to resume editing the record. [$0a$]Note that if no Email Account is specified, emails may be suspended in the Document Queue or fail to be sent.[$0a$]

This installation of AddonSoftware should only be used for demonstrations. It is[$0a$]running in the current install directory for your BASIS products, and as such,[$0a$]data and programs in this location can be overwritten by subsequent BASIS installs.[$0a$]Use Addon's Install/Upgrade Utilities to create separate instances of Addon outside[$0a$]of the BASIS install directory for production or development use. [$0a$]

This installation of AddonSoftware should only be used for demonstrations. It is[$0a$]running in the current install directory for your BASIS products, and as such,[$0a$]data and programs in this location can be overwritten by subsequent BASIS installs.[$0a$]Use Addon's Install/Upgrade Utilities to create separate instances of Addon outside[$0a$]of the BASIS install directory for production or development use. [$0a$]

Are you sure you want to disable the demo warning message? It should remain enabled [$0a$]unless you are certain this Addon installation will never be used for a production system. [$0a$]Once disabled, the warning can be re-enabled using Barista's AutoLaunch Maintenance [$0a$]task to set the Process Status to 'Not completed (N)' for Process ID DEMONAG.[$0a$]
